content: Lifestyle Mobile Plans Singtel MyRepublic Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Aug 2019Is it worth switching to MyRepublic mobile from Singtel?Looking to change my mobile phone contract with Singtel to a SIM-only plan as my contract will be over next month. Currently looking at Singtel's 10GB Plan($36/month) and MyRepublic Smart35 12GB ($35/month). However, is the service for MyRepublic mobile reliable? I've been using Singtel for a while now and I'm quite sceptical to change my carrier.1 answerAnswerBump1

Zen Rogue XuanLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 20 Aug 2019You can consider opting for GOMO, Singtel's sub-brand as they are giving 20GB, 200 outgoing calls and 200 SMS for $20. 0 comments0
